DLG ITM_1

DLG SPR_0
"""
*meow*
(end)
"""

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_1
"""
have you seen the cat in the flower patch?
i've heard he can make all your wishes come true!
but i'm too scared to go see him...
"""

DLG SPR_2
"""
the flower patch is just past here...
i really want to go see the cat, but i'm scared...
i've heard she can see the future...
"""

DLG ITM_1
...

DLG SPR_3
"""
i've heard people say some pretty wild things about that cat in the flower patch.

someone even said that it can heal all of your wounds with just a thought, which is preposterous, of course.
...
...
...
...
but...
...
but what if it's true?
"""

DLG SPR_4
"""
my friend went to go see that cat in the flower patch.
she said the cat whispered in her ear everything she had ever kept secret.

she seemed pretty shaken up about it, so i think she was telling the truth.
"""

DLG SPR_5
"""
the cat in the flower patch is a miracle worker!
personally, i think she was sent from another planet, to help us with our problems.
"""

DLG SPR_6
"""
my brother told me that someone told him that they saw the cat in the flower patch transform itself into a butterfly in a flash of golden light and fly away.
i wish i could turn into a butterfly...
"""

VAR a
42
